articles.title: Metals in 2020 about a nascent gold bull, enduring copper bear

articles.title: Something new in energy? Nah. Crude still follows weak gas rack
articles.description: Crude oil is likely to stay the course of the past decade and follow natural gas prices lower, with the coronavirus aggravating unfavorable trends.
